description: Creates the migration project using the specified parameters. You can run this action only after you create an instance profile and data providers using CreateInstanceProfile and CreateDataProvider.

parameters.name: SourceDataProviderDescriptors
parameters.description: Information about the source data provider, including the name, ARN, and Secrets Manager parameters. (dict) --- Information about a data provider. The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data provider. SecretsManagerSecretId (string) --- The identifier of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager Secret used to store access credentials for the data provider. SecretsManagerAccessRoleArn (string) --- The ARN of the role used to access Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager.

nested_params.name: DataProviderIdentifier
nested_params.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data provider.

nested_params.name: SecretsManagerSecretId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager Secret used to store access credentials for the data provider.

nested_params.name: SecretsManagerAccessRoleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the role used to access Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager.

parameters.name: TargetDataProviderDescriptors
parameters.description: Information about the target data provider, including the name, ARN, and Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager parameters. (dict) --- Information about a data provider. The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data provider. SecretsManagerSecretId (string) --- The identifier of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager Secret used to store access credentials for the data provider. SecretsManagerAccessRoleArn (string) --- The ARN of the role used to access Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager.

nested_params.name: DataProviderIdentifier
nested_params.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data provider.

nested_params.name: SecretsManagerSecretId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager Secret used to store access credentials for the data provider.

nested_params.name: SecretsManagerAccessRoleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the role used to access Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager.

parameters.name: InstanceProfileIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the associated instance profile. Identifiers must begin with a letter and must contain only ASCII letters, digits, and hyphens. They can't end with a hyphen, or contain two consecutive hyphens.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: One or more tags to be assigned to the migration project. (dict) --- A user-defined key-value pair that describes metadata added to an DMS resource and that is used by operations such as the following: AddTagsToResource ListTagsForResource RemoveTagsFromResource Key (string) --- A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be 1-128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with 'aws:' or 'dms:'. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regular expressions: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$'). Value (string) --- A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be 1-256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with 'aws:' or 'dms:'. ResourceArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) string that uniquely identifies the resource for which the tag is created.

parameters.name: SchemaConversionApplicationAttributes
parameters.description: The schema conversion application attributes, including the Amazon S3 bucket name and Amazon S3 role ARN. S3BucketPath (string) --- The path for the Amazon S3 bucket that the application uses for exporting assessment reports. S3BucketRoleArn (string) --- The ARN for the role the application uses to access its Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: S3BucketPath
nested_params.description: The path for the Amazon S3 bucket that the application uses for exporting assessment reports.

nested_params.name: S3BucketRoleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN for the role the application uses to access its Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: MigrationProject
nested_items.description: The migration project that was created.

nested_items.name: MigrationProjectName
nested_items.description: The name of the migration project.

nested_items.name: MigrationProjectArn
nested_items.description: The ARN string that uniquely identifies the migration project.

nested_items.name: MigrationProjectCreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the migration project was created.

nested_items.name: SourceDataProviderDescriptors
nested_items.description: Information about the source data provider, including the name or ARN, and Secrets Manager parameters.

nested_items.name: SecretsManagerSecretId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager Secret used to store access credentials for the data provider.

nested_items.name: SecretsManagerAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role used to access Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager.

nested_items.name: DataProviderName
nested_items.description: The user-friendly name of the data provider.

nested_items.name: DataProviderArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data provider.

nested_items.name: TargetDataProviderDescriptors
nested_items.description: Information about the target data provider, including the name or ARN, and Secrets Manager parameters.

nested_items.name: SecretsManagerSecretId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager Secret used to store access credentials for the data provider.

nested_items.name: SecretsManagerAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role used to access Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager.

nested_items.name: DataProviderName
nested_items.description: The user-friendly name of the data provider.

nested_items.name: DataProviderArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data provider.

nested_items.name: InstanceProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance profile for your migration project.

nested_items.name: InstanceProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the associated instance profile.

nested_items.name: TransformationRules
nested_items.description: The settings in JSON format for migration rules. Migration rules make it possible for you to change the object names according to the rules that you specify. For example, you can change an object name to lowercase or uppercase, add or remove a prefix or suffix, or rename objects.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A user-friendly description of the migration project.

nested_items.name: SchemaConversionApplicationAttributes
nested_items.description: The schema conversion application attributes, including the Amazon S3 bucket name and Amazon S3 role ARN.

nested_items.name: S3BucketPath
nested_items.description: The path for the Amazon S3 bucket that the application uses for exporting assessment reports.

nested_items.name: S3BucketRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the role the application uses to access its Amazon S3 bucket.
